data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Tiaret, Algeria.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tiaret, Algeria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 578 believers in Tiaret to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 846,223 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Tiaret to exponentially multiply disciples.
Lord, help the people of Tiaret, Algeria to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Jesus, I pray that all the Bedouin, Ziban people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Bedouin, Ziban people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Bedouin, Ziban people is yours.
Spirit, cause the 578 believers in Tiaret to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Tiaret against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Tiaret to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
